Articles.Content:
Saw this in KSP today (I don't know how to add imgur slideshows): imgur.com/gallery/CIMnb

Am modded, however I do not think mods caused this.

Potential easter egg?
Definitely from a mod. The planet is not stock and one of the kerbs has a KIS container.
Saw this too, starting yesterday, except with the regular Kerbin in the background and not that planet
This is from a recent update of KIS - Kerbal Inventory System. KIS now lets Kerbals carry the science experiment storage container around with them if you put it in their inventory.
